ygData.subject: RE: NPCs selling lambent stones (was Lambent Stones on  E'ci)5
ygData.msgSnippet: I had a Staff of the Observers for a while and carried it around in my EE bag.  I had to be very careful that I didn t accidentally sell it as Fine Steel to a
ygData.messageBody:
I had a Staff of the Observers for a while and carried it around in my EE
bag. I had to be very careful that I didn't accidentally sell it as Fine
Steel to a vendor.

"I will give you 2pp 4gp 2sp and 8cp for your Staff of the Observers".

Sure ya will. But of course it's comforting to know that I can sell my
Thulian Bladed Claws for 4.5pp if I get in a pinch. ;-)

Crier


> From: "Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas)" <Michael.Garramone@...>
>
> aye very true, though the mortificator staff actually looks like
> a staff of
> writhing icon, and you wouldn't be selling that =)
>
> Shada
>
> >
> > From: <kim@...>
> >
> > Yes, important lesson to anyone designing these types of
> > games: Give special items DIFFERENT graphics than normal
> > items. I gave away my crystalline blade while handing out
> > fine steel loot. I also sold an ebony blade to a merchant.
> >
> > --
> > John H. Kim
